common.tagline: Connect alumni, inspire mentorship, fuel lifelong belonging.

footer.about: KöprüMezun is a modern community platform that connects graduates, students, and mentors to communicate, form groups, run events, share opportunities, and support each other—built in Türkiye with data hosted domestically.

hero.title: A bilingual alumni community platform designed for trust and momentum.
hero.subtitle: Launch white-label alumni, student, and mentor experiences with feed, forums, mentoring, jobs, analytics, and SSO—fully localized for Türkiye.

featureHighlights.title: Unified content feed
featureHighlights.description: Moderated, tagged, and translated conversations keep every cohort engaged in context.

featureHighlights.title: Structured mentoring
featureHighlights.description: Match mentors and mentees with goals, progress tracking, and flash mentoring in one workspace.

featureHighlights.title: CASE-aligned analytics
featureHighlights.description: Real-time dashboards for engagement, giving, and volunteerism mapped to advancement KPIs.

workflows.title: Personalized onboarding journeys
workflows.description: Segmented welcome flows, in-app nudges, and notifications tuned for alumni, students, and staff.

workflows.title: Career intelligence
workflows.description: Jobs board, resume analyzer, and alumni matching accelerate career outcomes without extra tooling.

workflows.title: Fundraising & stewardship
workflows.description: Campaigns, progress visualizations, digital donor badges, and export-ready privacy controls.

testimonials.quote: The bilingual experience and privacy controls let us consolidate dozens of tools into one alumni hub.
testimonials.author: Dr. Selin Aksoy

testimonials.quote: Mentoring matches, jobs, and volunteer boards run on autopilot—our team finally focuses on strategy.
testimonials.author: Başak Demir
